blurb: Some had criticized the university for forcing students to "assume any and all risk" of contracting the virus, which they said amounted to a liability waiver.
imageDescription: Penn State officials said Thursday they never intended a student agreement regarding the coronavirus to be a waiver of the university's potential liability.
title: Penn State reverses course, plans to provide modified COVID-19 agreement for students

title: Spotlight PA partners with Triblive/Pittsburgh Tribune-Review, expands coverage of Western Pa.

blurb: When treatment facilities ignore coronavirus protocols, patients are forced to choose between recovery and safety.
imageDescription: Many rehab patients in Pennsylvania are forced to choose between going to treatment and risking getting the virus, or staying at home and struggling with substance use alone.
title: Inside some Pennsylvania rehabs, ‘it’s like COVID doesn’t exist’
